text: Heres an idea. Expose HUBL errors in the UI … it will help us self diagnose.
Idea: For the `{% section_header "section_header" %}` module allow the user to choose the header type (h1, h2, h3, h4) instead of just having it an h1.
A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.

Not sure if possible, but adding something Emmet to the Custom Module Editor would be awesome. Right now i'm finding that I am creating the shell of my modules in another editor and copy/pasting the code into the DM to add in HS stuff

I absolutely 100% would love if <http://emmet.io|emmet.io> were integrated.

I honestly do a lot of my html and css in codepen before I bring it over to HS just for the benefits of getting to use SASS and Emmet.

Once I have everything over in HS I just work in HS but it’d be great if atleast emmet were added.

I get not having SASS - and frankly   That’s getting less and less useful to me as CSS improves, custom properties and HubL gets me pretty darn far.
